enhancements.name: Slowed Prey
enhancements.description: Deal 40% more damage to Slowed enemies.

enhancements.name: Critical Momentum
enhancements.description: Each critical hit grants +10% damage for 10s (stacks up to 3).

enhancements.name: Last Stand
enhancements.description: Deal +1% damage for every 1% HP missing.

enhancements.name: Static Charge
enhancements.description: Moving 400 units charges lightning. Next hit releases a bolt hitting 3 enemies.

enhancements.name: Soul Harvest
enhancements.description: Kills grant Soul stacks (+0.5% XP each, max 50). Lost on level up.

enhancements.name: Overdrive
enhancements.description: After 30 hits, enter Overdrive for 5s: +50% cooldown reduction, +10% damage taken.

enhancements.name: Glass Soul
enhancements.description: All damage dealt +60%. All damage taken +30%.

enhancements.name: Executioner's Mark
enhancements.description: Enemies below 25% HP take 50% more damage.

enhancements.name: Thorns Mastery
enhancements.description: Thorns damage is doubled and applies to all nearby enemies.

enhancements.name: Vampiric Aura
enhancements.description: Heal 5 HP whenever an enemy dies within 250 units.

enhancements.name: Chaos Embrace
enhancements.description: Every 30s, one random stat doubles while another halves.

enhancements.name: Critical Ascension
enhancements.description: Critical hits have a 25% chance to ascend to the next tier.
